logo-text: Korean Language and TOPIK Study Center located in Tashkent
Janubiy Koreya Universitetlarida 100% ga: Opportunity to study at South Korean universities with up to 100% scholarships
5 oyda Topikdan 6 darajagacha olishda yo: We help you achieve TOPIK level 6 in 5 months
Topikdan yuqori darajani qo’lga kiritib,: Opportunity to study and work in South Korea, achieving a high level on TOPIC
Bepul kursga yozilish: Sign up for a free lesson.
Birinchi darsga bepul yoziling!: Sign up for the first lesson for free!
TOPIK academiya aniq siz uchun agar siz: TOPIK Academy is just right for you if you:
lione: You want to start speaking Korean in a short period of time.
litwo: You want to learn Korean and build your career
Topik sertifikatini olib Koreyaning nufu: You want to obtain a TOPIK certificate and win a scholarship to prestigious universities in Korea
lifoo: You want to go to South Korea to study and work
lifife: You have an intermediate level of Korean and want to improve it.
lisix: You have been studying for many years but still haven't achieved the desired results.
jamoasi sizga universitet tanlash, visa: team will closely assist you in choosing a university, obtaining a visa and winning a grant
muddat ichida Koreys tilida gaplashishni: want to speak Korean in a while

grant.title: Opportunity to win up to 100% grant for Korean universities
grant.description: The South Korean government’s scholarship program (GKS), offers international students the opportunity to receive up to 100% scholarship and a monthly stipend for undergraduate and graduate studies in Korea.
grant.scholarshipDetails: students have the opportunity to receive up to a 100% full grant and a monthly stipend.
grant.benefit1: Covers travel expenses to and from Korea at the beginning and end of the program.
grant.benefit2: A one-time settlement allowance of 200,000 Korean won (approximately 157 USD) upon arrival in Korea.
grant.benefit3: Full coverage of language course and university tuition fees (for master's and PhD students only).

about.title: Why choose TOPIK academy?
about.professionalTeachersDescription: You will be taught by teachers with more than 4 years of experience and a Topik level of 6.
about.freeCoworkingDescription: We offer free coworking zones for self-study, networking, and working on your skills.
about.weeklyEventsDescription: The TOPIK academy team regularly organizes additional events for its students.
about.freeExamsDescription: Participate in monthly trial exams to track your progress.
about.supportCuratorsDescription: You will have a curator to help you if you encounter difficulties in your studies.
about.consultantServiceDescription: We assist our successful graduates in obtaining visas to study in South Korea, choosing universities, and securing scholarships.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Do you provide study materials, or should I find them myself?
faq.question2: What language are the lessons conducted in?
faq.question3: Can I get additional help during the course?
faq.question4: Do you help with preparing for the trial exams?
faq.subtitle: Still have questions?
faq.contactPrompt: Leave your details, and we will contact you to answer all your questions.
faq.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully!
faq.errorMessage: Something went wrong! Please try again.
